title: GTA+
headline: GTA+
subtitle: Bonus GTA$1,000,000
content:
Become a GTA+ Member through August 31 to receive a GTA$1,000,000 bonus alongside the monthly GTA$500,000 automatically deposited into your Maze Bank account.

GTA+ Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel anytime. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
button: Select to sign up to GTA+
